name: Lissandra
title: the Ice Witch
lore: Lissandra's magic twists the pure power of ice into something dark and terrible. With the force of her black ice, she does more than freeze—she impales and crushes those who oppose her. To the terrified denizens of the north, she is known only as ''The Ice Witch.'' The truth is much more sinister: Lissandra is a corruptor of nature who plots to unleash an ice age on the world.
blurb: Lissandra's magic twists the pure power of ice into something dark and terrible. With the force of her black ice, she does more than freeze—she impales and crushes those who oppose her. To the terrified denizens of the north, she is known only as ''The...
allytips: You can instantly use your ultimate on yourself by pressing the self cast key and the ultimate key at once (alt+R by default).
Casting Glacial Path and then running in the opposite direction will leave your enemies uncertain which way you will actually go.

Lissandra's abilities are shorter range than those of many mages. As a result, buying items that offer both ability power and defense, like Zhonya's Hourglass and Banshee's Veil, can be a great choice to help her both survive and deal damage.
enemytips: The best way to stop Lissandra from moving using her Glacial Path is to immobilize her before she reactivates it.
Lissandra's Ring of Frost has a long cooldown at early ranks; engage her while it's on cooldown.
Lissandra's Ice Shard only slows the first unit it hits. Approach Lissandra from behind your team's minions to avoid being slowed.

riot_spell_q.name: Ice Shard
riot_spell_q.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

riot_spell_w.name: Ring of Frost
riot_spell_w.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Glacial Path
riot_spell_e.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

riot_spell_r.name: Frozen Tomb
riot_spell_r.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for {{ enemycastduration }} seconds.

On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for {{ selfcastduration }} seconds, healing for {{ healamount }}, increased by {{ selfcastmissinghpratio }}% for each {{ selfcastmissinghpperabove }}% Health she is missing. During this time Lissandra is untargetable and invulnerable but is unable to take any actions.

Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing {{ calculateddamage }} magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for {{ slowduration }} seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ slowamount*-100 }}%.

riot_spell_i.name: Iceborn Subjugation
riot_spell_i.description: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after 4 seconds, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Iceborn Subjugation
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy champion dies while '''Lissandra''' is near, she spawns a ''Frozen Thrall'' from their corpse.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: ''Frozen Thralls'' chase nearby enemies, prioritizing champions, {{tip|slow|slowing}} nearby enemies by 25% and shattering after 4 seconds, dealing {{as|{{pp|120 to 340;370;400;430;460;490;520}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}. ''Frozen Thralls'' initially have a slow movement speed, which increases over the duration.
wikia_skill_i1.notes: * ''Thralls'' are considered champions for {{tip|Turret Plating|Turret Plating's}} {{g|gold}} sharing.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Ice Shard
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lissandra''' hurls a spear of ice in a line which deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy it hits and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If the spear damages an enemy, it then shatters, gaining increased range and dealing the same damage to other enemies hit, but applying no slow.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* The shattering projectiles travel the remaining distance ''Ice Shard'' would plus an extra 100 units.
* ''Ice Shard'' sounds like breaking glass when shattering (the projectiles do not produce any sound on contact).
* ''Ice Shard's'' slow has particles resembling cold air.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage and the slow but will not stop the projectile from shattering.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Ring of Frost
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lissandra''' freezes all nearby enemies, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and briefly {{tip|root|rooting}} them.
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * ''Ring of Frost'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Lissandra's'' previous orders or animations (meaning she can overlap it with any of her other abilities or even basic attacks).

wikia_skill_e1.name: Glacial Path
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lissandra''' casts a claw of ice that moves forward in a line, decelerating over {{fd|1.25}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies it passes through.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Reactivating ''Glacial Path'' consumes the claw and {{tip|blinks}} '''Lissandra''' to its current location.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Lissandra'' can reactivate ''Glacial Path'' for the duration (plus another {{fd|0.2}}-{{fd|0.3}} after the claw 'skins' into the ground).
* ''Glacial Path'' allows ''Lissandra'' to blink past every single wall in all maps, so long as the claw is at least halfway through them.
* ''Glacial Path's'' cooldown starts with the initial cast whether or not the blink is used.
* ''Glacial Path'' cannot be reactivated if ''Lissandra'' is disabled.
* Enemies hit by the claw (stealthed or not) will make a sound and a small visual effect displays.
* ''Glacial Path's'' endpoint shows through terrain, fog of war, and brush to enemies within 600 range of it.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Frozen Tomb
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Enemy Cast:}} After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Lissandra''' freezes the target enemy [[champion]], {{tip|knockdown|knocking down}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} the target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|Self Cast:}} '''Lissandra''' instantly entombs herself, placing herself in {{tip|stasis}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds while {{tip|healing}} herself over the duration, with the heal increased by {{as|{{pp|11|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% of '''missing''' health}}|health}} at time of cast.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Self-Heal|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Self-Heal|{{ap|100*2 to 200*2}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description3: Upon cast, after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, Black Ice spreads from ''Frozen Tomb's'' target and lasts for 3 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all unique enemies entering the area, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them while they remain within.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* It takes ~{{fd|0.4}} for ''Frozen Tomb'' to stun and damage the enemy target (they may become untargetable during this window to avoid the effects but the ice field will still be formed) and any movement abilities will be immediately canceled if enemies use them to try to get away from ''Lissandra'' when she targets them.
** It takes ~1 second for ''Frozen Tomb's'' slow field to fully form.
* Enemies who come in contact with ''Frozen Tomb's'' slow field will be damaged and a small visual and sound effect will play.
** Enemies can only be damaged by the ice field once per cast (if they come in contact with it with an active {{ii|Banshee's Veil|spell shield}} they will consume it to become immune to any damage from that particular cast).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the single-targeted portion and the radiating ice damage but will not stop it from spreading.
